HPI 931 Subaru Impreza STi 2005 Super Taikyu Series ST-2 Class Winner T. Yoshida/K. Koizumi



2005 was the second year that HPI sponsored the Team Prova Subaru Impreza STI entered in the Japanese Super Taikyu endurance race series. Toshihiro Yoshida & Kazuhiro Koizumi drove this Impreza in the ST-2 class for 2,001cc - 2,500cc 4WD vehicles.

The Mitsubishi Lancer Evo IX of Akikiho Nakaya & Takayuki Kinoshita took the series lead from the start of the season with Yoshida & Koizumi in second place. The standings stayed this way through round 5. In round 6, Yoshida & Koizumi took the series lead from Nakaya & Kinoshita. Wins for Yoshida & Koizumi in rounds 7 & 8 allowed them to hold on to the series lead and win the ST-2 class.

The photo above is from preparation for Round 1 at Sendai Hiland Raceway on April 24, 2005.
